definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: He bought an English-Chinese dictionary in order to look up the words he doesn't know.
sentences.chinese: 他买了本英汉字典，以便查找他不认识的单词。

sentences.english: My English-Chinese Dictionary has disappeared. Who could have taken it?
sentences.chinese: 我的叶英汉词典曳不见了，谁可能把它拿走了呢？

sentences.english: The 5th edition Oxford English-Chinese Dictionary is much thicker than the 4th one.
sentences.chinese: 第五版牛津英汉双解词典比第四版厚得多。

sentences.english: The teacher recommended buying an English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 老师建议买一本英汉字典。

sentences.english: The analysis conduces to smooth expression in English-Chinese translation.
sentences.chinese: 对比分析有助于实现英汉互译之目的。

sentences.english: We've planning out an English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在准备编一部英汉字典。

sentences.english: Can you recommend me a good English – Chinese dictionary ?
sentences.chinese: 你能推荐一本好的英汉字典给我吗？

sentences.english: Our English teacher suggested our buying a good English Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 英语老师建议我们买一本好的英汉字典。

sentences.english: Utilizing a data-based research, this paper makes a contrastive study of metaphorical expressions in English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本文运用语料调查的方法对比研究英汉隐喻运动表达。

sentences.english: He promised me a new English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 他许诺说要给我一本新英汉字典。

sentences.english: English and Chinese psych causative verbs fall into four broad categories.
sentences.chinese: 英汉使役心理动词按形态可分为四大类。

sentences.english: Have you got an electronic English-Chinese dictionary?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有电子版的英汉字典？

sentences.english: The E/C section has the English word followed by the Chinese equivalent.
sentences.chinese: 英汉部分的英语单词后面都有相对应的汉语。

sentences.english: In Chinglish City you can get a ChineseEnglish email address. Register now.
sentences.chinese: 在秦英城你可以得到一个汉英英汉电子邮件地址。

sentences.english: The question is whether this dictionary is worth buying or not.
sentences.chinese: 问题是这本英汉词典是否值得一买。

sentences.english: Theres a surprising similarity in the origins of English and Chinese idioms.
sentences.chinese: 在英汉成语的来源上，两者有着惊人的相似之处。

definition: dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]
